content: pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols for help using japanese charted patterns please visit the japanese knitting & crochet group 1 translation requests can be made in this thread 2 **materials ** * color a 55g 104 5 meters * color b 5g 9 5 meters * color c 11g 20 9 meters * color d 15g 28 5 meters * japanese size 5/0 crochet hook 3 0 mm 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/japanese-knitting-and-crochet 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/pierrot-yarns/884508/
